Node control api¶

Container¶

class Container(id, host, image, command, created, status, ports, name, container_driver=None, network_driver=None, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

Container object which represents a container on the deployment.

Parameters

  • id (str) – Container ID

  • host (str) – Host name

  • image (str) – Image ID

  • command (str) – Command when starting the container

  • created (str) – Time created

  • status (str) – Status of container Running/Suspended

  • ports (str) – Container ports

  • name (str) – Container name

  • container_driver (drivers.DockerContainer) – drivers.DockerContainer Driver for communicating with the container on the deployment

  • network_driver (object) – Driver for communicating with the network on the deployment

restart()[source]¶

Restart the container

start()[source]¶

Start the container

stop()[source]¶

Stop the container

stress(stressors)[source]¶

Perform stress test on the container using stress-ng.

Parameters

stressors (str) – stress-ng stressors

terminate()[source]¶

Terminate the container

Deployment¶

class Deployment(hosts, driver, deployment_info=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Deployment object which represents the target openstack deployment

Parameters

  • hosts (dict) – Dictionary of available hosts on the deployment.

  • driver (drivers.DeploymentDriver) – Driver for executing commands on the deployment.

  • deployment_info (str) – Information about the deployment. This is gathered from host discovery.

get_ips()[source]¶

Get the IP addresses of the available hosts.

Returns

List of host IPs

Return type

list

property hosts¶

Sorted list of available host objects.

Host¶

class Host(ip, containers=None, host_info=None, driver=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Host object representing a host on the deployment.

Parameters

  • ip (str) – Host IP

  • driver (drivers.HostDriver) – Driver for executing host commands on the deployment.

  • containers (dict) – Dictionary of container.Container objects available on the host.

  • host_info (str) – Additional info about the host gathered from discover_hosts.

get_container(container_id=None, name=None)[source]¶

Get a container from the host. Can provide either container id or name.

Parameters

  • container_id (str, optional) – ID of the container. Can be partial or full id.

  • name (str, optional) – Container name.

Returns

Target Docker Container object

Return type

container.Container

list_containers()[source]¶

List the available containers on the host

stress(stressors)[source]¶

Perform stress-test on the host.

Parameters

stressors (str) – Stressors available from the stress-ng module.
